thread.title: Quintessence

author: Quintessence
title: Quintessence
text: My daughter received the product the dress was just like the picture although it will need to be altered because she is on the shorter side and we went up a size which was a good. I think she is in between a medium and large for the dress we ordered. Anyways the only complaint is you can't use multiple payment methods other than that great service fast shipping.
